alert.note: Alert for Brown; Edmunds (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 10:30PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Edmunds and southwestern Brown Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1130 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cravens Corner, or 8 miles east of Ipswich, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mina around 1150 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Mina Lake Rec Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for north central and northeastern South Dakota.
